languages.text: "Ваши слова — услада для моих ушей, шерин. Но какая из них вам больше по нраву?"

traits.locale_text: "Ваши слова — услада для моих ушей, шерин. Но какая из них вам больше по нраву?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Your words are music to my ears, shereen. But which option do you prefer?"
languages.original_text: "Ваши слова — услада для моих ушей, шерин. Но какая из них вам больше по нраву?"

traits.locale_text: "Your words are music to my ears, shereen. But which option do you prefer?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your words are music to my ears, shereen. But which option do you prefer?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your words are music to my ears, shereen. But which option do you prefer?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your words are music to my ears, shereen. But which option do you prefer?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “你的话简直就像音乐一样动听，亲爱的。不过，你更喜欢哪种方案呢？”
languages.original_text: "Your words are music to my ears, shereen. But which option do you prefer?"

traits.locale_text: “你的话简直就像音乐一样动听，亲爱的。不过，你更喜欢哪种方案呢？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Sus palabras son música para mis oídos, shereen, pero ¿qué opción prefiere?».
languages.original_text: "Your words are music to my ears, shereen. But which option do you prefer?"

traits.locale_text: «Sus palabras son música para mis oídos, shereen, pero ¿qué opción prefiere?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あんたの言葉は音楽のようね、シャリーン。だけど、どんな手段をお望みかしら？」
languages.original_text: "Your words are music to my ears, shereen. But which option do you prefer?"

traits.locale_text: 「あんたの言葉は音楽のようね、シャリーン。だけど、どんな手段をお望みかしら？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne demande pas mieux, shereen, mais dites-moi, quelle option préférez-vous ? »
languages.original_text: "Your words are music to my ears, shereen. But which option do you prefer?"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne demande pas mieux, shereen, mais dites-moi, quelle option préférez-vous ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Eure Worte sind Musik in meinen Ohren, Shereen. Aber welche Option würdet Ihr bevorzugen?"
languages.original_text: "Your words are music to my ears, shereen. But which option do you prefer?"

traits.locale_text: "Eure Worte sind Musik in meinen Ohren, Shereen. Aber welche Option würdet Ihr bevorzugen?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Bunu duyduğuma sevindim şirinim. Peki hangi seçeneği tercih edersin?"
languages.original_text: "Your words are music to my ears, shereen. But which option do you prefer?"

traits.locale_text: "Bunu duyduğuma sevindim şirinim. Peki hangi seçeneği tercih edersin?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
